sense.name: communicate with a hiss
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent] HISS (PP{AT NP2[patient[concrete]]}) NOTE: Compare to Sense 2; Sense 1 MUST have an agent NP1.
sense.examples: Please hiss a comment below! They should have hissed (at) the presidential candidate. 'I don't want to marry you!' She hissed again. The cat hissed at us as we approached her.

sense.name: Make a sharp whooshing noise.
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[theme[inanimate]] HISS (PP{P NP[source[concrete]) NOTE: Compare to Sense 1; Sense 2 CANNOT have an agent NP1.
sense.examples: Air hissed from the hole in our tire. The hose hissed as water spat from it.
